'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{bow}}.

==Background==
This is what remains of the once might throne chamber of [[Ukaizo]] and the seat of power of King Waturi.

==Points of interest==
* A straightforward area. Approach the throne to make the King appear, right after you kill a Scourge and two Wardens. 
* The inaccessible area to the left can be accessed by manipulating the water pedestals. See [[The Twin Eels]] for reference.

==Characters==
* [[King Wingauro o WatÅ«ri I]]

==Loot==
* [[The Twin Eels]]: On the pedestal to the southeast.
